description: Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis says his country has shown that it is a "passport of safety".
title: Coronavirus: Greece to reopen tourism season in June, PM says
title_page: Coronavirus: Greece to reopen tourism season in June, PM says - BBC News
maintext: "It's a great reputation," the prime minster said, adding that the country had provided a "hygienic shield in every location of hospitality... our passion that is always inspired by Xenios Zeus". The Greek god Zeus was god of xenia or hospitality, among many other things.
